sentences.en: A changing world has put pressures on the company.
sentences.cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

sentences.en: Air not only occupies space but it also has weight.
sentences.cn: 空气不仅占据空间，而且它还具有重量。

sentences.en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: Few would argue that this team has experience and proven ability.
sentences.cn: 这个队伍的丰富经验和表现出来的实力是众所公认的。

sentences.en: He has a visual impairment in the right eye.
He has never exhibited the self-confidence, bordering on arrogance, of his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 他从未表现出他前任的那种近乎傲慢的自信。

sentences.en: He has received extensive corrective surgery to his skull.
sentences.cn: 他的头骨做过大面积的矫形手术。

sentences.en: Her copy of 《Evangeline》 has many helpful notes at the back.
sentences.cn: 她那本《伊万杰琳》后面有许多有用的注解。

sentences.en: I believe she has some influence with the headmaster -- she might persuade him.
sentences.cn: 我相信她的话在校长面前有一些分量，她有可能说服他。

sentences.en: Recession has simply accelerated changes that have been reshaping the industry anyway.
sentences.cn: 经济萧条只不过加速了原本就在改变行业状况的变化。

sentences.en: Stewart has developed a tendency to mix it verbally with the opposition.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特现在变得只要和别人意见不合，就准备大吵一架。

sentences.en: The club has moved its meeting to Saturday, January 22nd.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部已经把会议日期改到1月22号，星期六。

sentences.en: The Estonian parliament has passed a resolution declaring the republic fully independent.
sentences.cn: 爱沙尼亚议会已经通过了宣布共和国完全独立的决议。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister has been briefed by her parliamentary aides.
sentences.cn: 首相已听取了她议会助手的简要汇报。

sentences.en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentences.cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

sentences.en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.
sentences.cn: 今天地方选举的投票一开始就人头攒动。

sentences.en: There has been a very mixed reaction to the decision.
sentences.cn: 对于这个决定的反应非常不一致。

words.tran_cn: 有；吃（have的第三人称单数现在式）；让…作

trans.tran_cn: 有( have的第三人称单数 )，（亲属关系中）接受，拿，买到
trans.tran_en: the third person singular of the present tense of have
